ingredients.item: 2 small ripe avocados, peeled and chopped
250g pack Waitrose Smokey Mixed Bean Salad

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6.
Warm the ciabattas in the oven for 5-7 minutes, then halve horizontally and drizzle with oil. Place on a hot griddle for 1-2 minutes and cook until slightly charred.
Meanwhile, mash the avocado with the chilli sauce, keeping it chunky, and spread over the ciabattas. Top with the beans and serve with a side salad.
